Thanks for the upload. But as you pointed out in your description and in the comments - this is NOT a S.B.S. upload. So leechers can either find and download some software and convert this into a SBS file, or a SBS version of this video is here:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6662942/How_to_Train_Your_Dragon_1080P__3D_Movie_By_vigvinraj

For people that downloaded it without knowing its not merged, here is mkvmerge's download page. It successfully merged the left and right files: 

http://www.bunkus.org/videotools/mkvtoolnix/downloads.html#windows

Thanks L3g3nd for the link

Hello all, I just bought a 3d-projector that I can hook up with my PS3. So how exactly do I do it? Download the merge sofwtare, merge left and right mkv files to one mkv file and watch it on PS3 media server like i do with all other mkvs? Anything else I need to know? Thanks a lot in advance for your help!
